title: Globalstar spare satellite to launch on SpaceX rocket this month
summary: A spare satellite for Globalstar’s data relay and messaging constellation will launch from Cape Canaveral on a Falcon 9 rocket later this month, multiple sources said, in a previously-undisclosed mission on SpaceX’s schedule.

title: Redwire, MDA, to produce tactical communications antennas for military satellites
summary: Redwire announced June 7 it won a contract to produce 42 tactical communications antennas for U.S. military satellites in low Earth orbit.

title: South Korea cancels Apophis probe
summary: Citing a “lack of technical capabilities,” South Korea has dropped the plan of developing a robotic spacecraft to escort asteroid Apophis during its 2029 close encounter with Earth.

title: NASA and SpaceX stand down on Dragon launch to study hydrazine issue
summary: Misplaced hypergols are not something one messes around with.

title: SpaceX, NASA call off Cargo Dragon launch after discovering fuel leak
summary: SpaceX and NASA have decided to call off an imminent Cargo Dragon 2 space station resupply mission after discovering a possible fuel...
